price: 32. (Al-lah) le dijo: “Iblis, ¿por qué no te has postrado con los demás?”.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā laka allā takūna maʿa al-sājidīna
